scripts.server:dev: cd server && npm run start:dev && cd ..
scripts.build: rm -rf build && npm run build:server && npm run build:client && npm run move:server:client
scripts.install: cd client && npm install && cd .. && cd server && npm install && cd ..
scripts.build:server: cd server && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build:client: cd client && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.move:server: mv ./server/build . && cp ./server/package.json ./build && cd build && npm install && cd ..
scripts.move:server:client: npm run move:server && mv ./client/build ./build && cd build && mv ./build client && cd ..
